PluginsÂ¶

The term plugins is used rather loosely in the context of PyChannel. In PyChannel a plugin is any file in the plugins folder of the package. All of these files are imported at runtime. Each of these modules is supposed to have some variable called plug which represents a class or subclass of PluginHelper and then uses the PluginHelper‘s register() decorator to subscribe to certain signals.
